attributes.action: RADICALLY reform the Britsh democratic process.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce Proportional Representation for the next general election, reduce the House of Commons to 400 members, reform the House of Lords into an elected Senate of 250, decentralise substantial powers and money to the regions, reduce the Prime Minister's power within the Commons, and reduce the power of the Whips. Also, reform Prime Minister's Questions such that questions must be answered directly and honestly unless there is a national security issue or someone's life may be at risk.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
